subject: Fimware Upgrade help
description_text:
I would like some help because I have a set of Simsoon accelerator and brake pedals, silver model.
like the one in the photo below, and I would like instructions on how to update the firmware so 
I can use the new Simsoon software. Thank you.

conversations.body_text:
Hello, good morning! I can't access the page to view my ticket. Could you please send me the firmware update instructions and links via email? Thank you.

> Em 01/12/2025 10:05 -04 support@simsonn.com

Hi Tarcisio Fernandes,      If your pedal is version 1.7.1, you can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to update the firmware:  If the software indicates that the version is too old, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu to start the firmware update;  After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;  Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.  Additionally, please ensure that your computer is properly grounded.  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
